mpp_container: Preloaded UTOPIA Global scenario for compartments parameterization. Modify compartments dimensions and characteristics (i.e. water flow velocities, compartments depth and surface area extension, water SPM concentrations, etc.)
es_container: Particles are distributed in 5 size bins of 1 order of magnitude difference from micro to nanometers (i.e. 5000,500,50,5,0.5 Âµm)
import-export: Import and Export UTOPIA model configuration files.
